name: Vox Ad Honorem
description:
Vox Ad Honorem is a Bullet hell/Typing game in which you play as a gladiator in rap duels during the Roman Empire, only playable with a keyboard.

This game has been made by 2 students in 3rd grade at e-Artsup Paris during a Game Jam

(WARNING) The game is still in development and don't represent the final result. This game is actually a demo of our concept and currently propose a single fight

FREESTYLE !

DODGE THE PUNCHLINES !

GLORY !

Challenge the greatest gladiators of the empire and make the pen speak

Avoid attacks from your detractors during shoot 'em up phases

Use your keyboard to defend yourself

CODING : Fayçal KHILA

ART : Kevin ROSEAUX

 

All of these musics are royalty free

  • Roman Legion | Hard Trap | Rap Beat prod. by Havazy
  • JID x Dreamville x Earthgang Type Beat | “Opera“
 
  1. Download the .RAR file.
  2. Drag it in any folder you want.
  3. Right Click and click on "Extract Here".
  4. Open the folder called "VoxAdHonorem"
  5. Double click on "VoxAdHonorem.exe"
  6. Congratulations you are ready to play !
